00029 StreamSink::StreamSink(std::ostream*os_, bool usecolor_, bool manage_)
00030     : os(os_), manage(manage_) , usecolor(usecolor_) {
00031 
00032     char * env = getenv("COLUMNS");
00033     columns = env ? atoi(env) : DEFAULT_COLUMNS;
00034 
00035     if(columns<COLUMNS_LIMIT) {
00036         *os << "Found columns = " << columns << ", using " << DEFAULT_COLUMNS << " instead." <<std::endl;
00037         columns = DEFAULT_COLUMNS;
00038     }
00039 
00040     // *os << "Console started ("<<columns<<" columns) ." << std::endl;
00041 }
00042 
00043 string pad(const string&r, unsigned int l, const string&t=" ") {
00044     string s(r);
00045     while(s.length()<l) s=t+s;
00046     return s;
00047 }
00048 
00049 string chop(const string&r, unsigned int len) {
00050     return r.length() <= len ? r : r.substr(0, len);
00051 }
00052 
00053 string align(const string& r, unsigned int len) {
00054     return chop(pad(r,len), len);
00055 }
00056 
00057 template<class T> string toString(const T&t) {
00058     std::ostringstream oss;
00059         oss << t;
00060     return oss.str();
00061 }

00065 int splitString(const string& input, 
00066        const string& delimiter, vector<string>& results, 
00067        bool includeEmpties);

00069 void splitStringToSize(string s, size_t size, vector<string>& results) {
00070     while(s.length()>size) {
00071         string start = s.substr(0,size-3) + " ->";
00072         results.push_back(start);
00073         s = s.substr(size-3);
00074     }
00075     while(s.length()<size) s.append(" ");
00076     results.push_back(s);
00077 }
00078 
00079 void StreamSink::handle(const LogMessage&l) {
00080     string TERM_RESET = "\e[0m";
00081     const int LEN_FILE   = 30;
00082     const int LEN_STAT   =  4;
00083     const int LEN_LINE   =  3;
00084 
00085     ostringstream oss; // XXX
00086     
00087     ostringstream left;
00088     /*
00089     left
00090         << align(         l.module, LEN_MODULE ) << "|"
00091         << align(           l.file, LEN_FILE   ) << ":"
00092         << align( toString(l.line), LEN_LINE   ) << "|"; */
00093 
00094 
00095     const char * file = l.file.c_str();
00096     const char * filename = file + l.file.length();
00097     for(;filename>file && (*(filename-1) != '/');filename--) ;
00098     
00099     left
00100         << align(l.module+"|"+filename, LEN_FILE ) << ":"
00101         << align( toString(l.line), LEN_LINE   ) << "|"; 
00102         
00103     if(l.level==Error)
00104         *os << "\a";
00105         
00106     string symbol, color;
00107     switch(l.level) {
00108         case(Trace): symbol = " ~  "; color = "1;37;47"; break;
00109         case(Debug): symbol = " db "; color = "1;37;45"; break;
00110         case(Info ): symbol = "    "; color = "1;37;42"; break;
00111         case(Error): symbol = " :( "; color = "1;37;41"; break;
00112         case(Fatal): symbol = " !! "; break;
00113     }
00114     
00115     color = string("\e[") + color + string("m");
00116     
00117     if(!usecolor) {
00118         left << align(symbol, LEN_STAT);
00119     }   
00120     
00121     string leftString = left.str();
00122     string::size_type header = leftString.length();
00123     string::size_type rest = columns-header;
00124 
00125     vector<string> lines1;
00126     splitString(l.message,"\n", lines1, true);
00127     
00128     vector<string> lines2;
00129 
00130     for(size_t i=0;i<lines1.size();i++)
00131         splitStringToSize(lines1[i], rest, lines2);
00132 
00133     for(size_t i=0;i<lines2.size();i++) {
00134         string line = lines2[i];
00135 
00136         if(i!=0) {
00137             for(size_t a=0;a<header;a++) oss << " "; 
00138         } else oss << leftString;
00139     
00140         if(usecolor) oss << color;
00141         oss << line;
00142         if(usecolor) oss << TERM_RESET;
00143         oss << std::endl;
00144     }
00145     
00146     *(this->os) << oss.str() << std::flush;
00147 }
00148 
00149 StreamSink::~StreamSink() {
00150     if(manage) delete os;
00151 }

00153 int splitString(const string& input, 
00154        const string& delimiter, vector<string>& results, 
00155        bool includeEmpties)
00156 {
00157     int iPos = 0;
00158     int newPos = -1;
00159     int sizeS2 = (int)delimiter.size();
00160     int isize = (int)input.size();
00161 
00162     if( 
00163         ( isize == 0 )
00164         ||
00165         ( sizeS2 == 0 )
00166     )
00167     {
00168         return 0;
00169     }
00170 
00171     vector<int> positions;
00172 
00173     newPos = input.find (delimiter, 0);
00174 
00175     if( newPos < 0 ) { 
00176     results.push_back(input);
00177         return 1; 
00178     }
00179 
00180     int numFound = 0;
00181 
00182     while( newPos >= iPos )
00183     {
00184         numFound++;
00185         positions.push_back(newPos);
00186         iPos = newPos;
00187         newPos = input.find (delimiter, iPos+sizeS2);
00188     }
00189 
00190     if( numFound == 0 )
00191     {
00192         return 0;
00193     }
00194 
00195     for( int i=0; i <= (int)positions.size(); ++i )
00196     {
00197         string s("");
00198         if( i == 0 ) 
00199         { 
00200             s = input.substr( i, positions[i] ); 
00201         }
00202         int offset = positions[i-1] + sizeS2;
00203         if( offset < isize )
00204         {
00205             if( i == (int) positions.size() )
00206             {
00207                 s = input.substr(offset);
00208             }
00209             else if( i > 0 )
00210             {
00211                 s = input.substr( positions[i-1] + sizeS2, 
00212                       positions[i] - positions[i-1] - sizeS2 );
00213             }
00214         }
00215         if( includeEmpties || ( s.size() > 0 ) )
00216         {
00217             results.push_back(s);
00218         }
00219     }
00220     return numFound;
00221     }
00222 
00223 }
